about_the_game:
Tower Deckfense is a game that combines the genres of tower defense and deck building with roguelike elements. Choose your starting deck and begin your journey!

Overview

In each playthrough, you'll start with your initial cards and build on them as you progress. You can add cards, duplicate them, remove them, make them cheaper, or level them up...

When you reach a combat stage, you'll have to make the most of the cards you draw from your deck. You'll need to strategically use the terrain and modifiers you encounter to prevent any enemies from reaching your base.

Towers

  • There are currently 15 types of towers.

  • Each tower can be upgraded up to 3 levels.

  • Every tower has unique characteristics, such as area damage, burn effects, or slow effects.

  • Each tower deals a specific type of damage, making it more or less effective depending on the type of enemy it faces.

Enemies

  • There are 8 different types of enemies, each with its own special ability.

  • Each enemy type has 3 evolution levels, with increasing levels of danger as they evolve.

3 Types of Cards

  • Tower Cards: Allow you to build new towers or upgrade existing ones of the same type.

  • Upgrade Cards: Provide unique enhancements to your towers, such as increased range, higher damage, poison damage, and more.

  • Spell Cards: Grant immediate effects, such as drawing new cards or directly damaging enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-9600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 4GB / Radeon RX580 4GB or better

short_description: Tower Deckfense is an exciting blend of tower defense and deck building. Build your deck strategically, upgrade your towers, and equip them with powerful modifiers to discover the best combinations and devastate your enemies.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
